attributes.action: change the law immediately to ensure that citizens of Spain living in the UK are treated in exactly the same manner as UK citizens living in Spain with regard to medical treatment.  No Spanish citizen under retirement age who has been resident in the UK for two years or more should receive ANY (including emergency treatment) medical treatment free of charge, which is the situation which obtains in Spain with regard to UK citizens who are under retirement age and who have lived there for two years or more
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK citizens living in Spain are required to pay for ALL medical treatment once they have lived in Spain for TWO YEARS.  It is not right, nor is it anything to do with EU law, that Spanish citizens living in the UK should be treated differently, as they (along with ALL OTHER FOREIGNERS) are currently, whereby they ALL receive treatment free on the NHS, which is paid for by people like me, someone who would NOT be entitled to free treatment if I was to go to their country!
